name: County Hosts Earth Day 2025 Fair
description: The County and several community organizations hosted an Earth Day Fair on Friday at the County Operations Center. Interactive booths featured information about recycling, stormwater protection, food waste prevention and ways people can help protect and improve water quality with everyday actions.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Reading Time:  < 1 minuteThe County and several community organizations hosted an Earth Day Fair on Friday at the County Operations Center. Interactive booths featured information about recycling, stormwater protection, food waste prevention and ways people can help protect and improve water quality with everyday actions.
Attendees were able to enjoy educational displays, games, touch tables, wildlife demos, electric vehicles and a demonstration garden.
To learn about more Earth Day events in April, how-to videos and proactive ways to live more sustainably, visit www.sandiegocounty.gov/earthday.
